title: Create Variables
text: We are looking to find the measure of two angles. Let $$x=measure$$ of larger angle and $$y=measure$$ of smaller angle.

title: Translate to a System of Equations
text: The two angles are supplementary, translating into $$x+y=180$$. The larger angle is 18 less than twice the measure of the smaller angle, translating into $$x=2y-18$$.

title: Solve the System
text: Using substitution we can substitute $$x=2y-18$$ into $$x+y=180$$ to solve for y, the smaller angle. \\n $$x+y=180$$ \\n $$2y-18+y$$ $$=180$$ \\n $$3y-18=180$$ \\n $$3y=198$$
